articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Message from National Leader of Workers' Party of Mexico
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Message from National Leader of Workers' Party of Mexico
 Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a message from Alberto Anaya Gutierrez,  national leader of the Workers' Party of Mexico, on Nov. 27.
					 Alberto Anaya Gutierrez in the message said he has the honor of paying highest tribute to leader Kim Jong Il, eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, on behalf of all the members of the Workers' Party of Mexico and on his own behalf on the occasion of the second anniversary of Kim Jong Il's demise.
					
					 The message expressed full support and firm solidarity for the WPK and the Korean people in their struggle to build a thriving socialist nation and achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country, convinced that the Songun revolutionary idea and feats of Kim Jong Il would continue shining under Kim Jong Un's outstanding and tested leadership.
					
					 Availing himself of the opportunity, the national leader sincerely wished Kim Jong Un great success in his noble work of leading the revolutionary cause of Songun and the cause of global independence.

articles.title: U.S. Citizen Deported from DPRK
articles.content:
U.S. Citizen Deported from DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- As already reported, a relevant institution of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea (DPRK) detained and investigated U.S. citizen Merrill Edward Newman who entered the DPRK under the guise of a tourist to confirm the whereabouts of the spies and terrorists who had been trained and dispatched by him, an intelligence officer, during the last Korean War. 
					 According to the investigation, Newman entered the DPRK with a wrong understanding of it and perpetrated a hostile act against it.
					
					 Taking into consideration his admittance of the act committed by him on the basis of his wrong understanding, apology made by him for it, his sincere repentance of it and his advanced age and health condition, the above-said institution deported him from the country from a humanitarian viewpoint.

articles.title: Message of Sympathy to South African President
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to South African President
 Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a message of sympathy to South African President Jacob Gedleyihlekisa Zuma in connection with the fact that Nelson Mandela, son produced by the South African people, died of long illness.
					 The message expressed profound condolences to the president and, through him, to the South African government and people and family members of the deceased.
					
					 The message said that the feats performed by Nelson Mandela in the struggle against racism and for democracy in South Africa would always be remembered by the South African people and progressive mankind.
					
					 It hoped that the South African government and people would register successes in their efforts to build a new, prosperous society as desired by the deceased under the leadership of the president.

articles.title: DPRK Ambassador to Egypt Appointed
articles.content:
DPRK Ambassador to Egypt Appointed
Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- Pak Chun Il was appointed as DPRK ambassador to Egypt, according to a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- Participants in the great workshop for people in the field of construction visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Saturday.
					 They laid a floral basket and bunches of flowers before the statues in reverence for Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who provided a heyday of revolutionary and popular architectural art and thus recorded a shining chapter in human history of architecture and paid a tribute to them.

articles.title: Delegation of International Affairs Institute Comes Back Home
articles.content:
Delegation of International Affairs Institute Comes Back Home
Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the International Affairs Institute headed by Vice-Director Kim Ul Ho flew back home on Saturday after wrapping up its visit to Britain.

articles.title: Senior Party, State and Army Officials Visit Lodgings of Participants in Great Workshop
articles.content:
Senior Party, State and Army Officials Visit Lodgings of Participants in Great Workshop
 Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- Leading officials of the party, state and army on Saturday visited the lodgings of the participants in the great workshop for people in the field of construction.
					 Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Ki Nam and other officials of the party and armed forces organs and the Cabinet met the participants.
					
					 They congratulated the people in the field of construction participating in the significant great workshop, a landmark in the history of Juche-based architecture, under the warm solicitude of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They called upon the participants to successfully build more monumental edifices true to the noble intention of Kim Jong Un and greatly contribute to glorifying Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea as a highly civilized and powerful country where people fully enjoy wealth and luxury under socialism.
					
					 They said all the participants should firmly arm themselves with the original and popular ideas and theories of architectural aesthetics of the Workers' Party of Korea and acquire profound knowledge of architecture as required by the new century during the workshop.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of State Academy of Sciences
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of State Academy of Sciences
 Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, inspected the State Academy of Sciences on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of its foundation.
					 Looking round the exhibition of scientific achievements there, Pak learned in detail about specifications of ultra-modern equipment and their economical efficiency and how they are applied to the production and encouraged those scientists and technicians in their vigorous campaign of technology and brains for developing new technology and products.
					
					 Then he acquainted himself with the issues arising in the construction of the Unjong scientists' quarter and had a consultative meeting with officials concerned.
					
					 Saying that the academy has developed into a reliable center of the nation for scientific researches under the wise leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea, he called for making greater scientific and technological achievements to glorify the undying feats performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and carry out the plan of Marshal Kim Jong Un for building a thriving nation.
					
					 Discussed at the consultative meeting were steps for building well the quarter into the Juche-based scientific research base and a development and dissemination base for IT, Nano-technology, energy engineering and other latest science and technology.

articles.title: Disabled Persons in DPRK Lead Worthwhile Life
articles.content:
Disabled Persons in DPRK Lead Worthwhile Life
 Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- The disabled persons in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea expressed their deep thanks to the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the government for having taken warm care of them.
					 Such expressions were made at a meeting held here on the occasion of the International Day of Persons with Disabilities (December 3). 
					
					 Ryang Chol Su, a writer of the Central Committee of the Writers Union of Korea (WUK), who has authored more than 80 literary works for 30-odd years, told KCNA: 
					
					 Being a disabled man, I graduated from Kim Il Sung University and now work at the WUK Central Committee.
					
					 The government granted me a nice flat on the bank of the River Pothong, and has shown special care for my life, providing regular health checkup. My children have become officials of different organs under the loving care of the WPK. 
					
					 My mind is filled with an idea that such benefits should be repaid with loyalty through generations. 
					
					 Ri Chol Song, who came third in the men's table-tennis singles of the 3rd Asian Youth Para Games, said:
					
					 I became disabled by accident at the age of 12. Since then I began to play table-tennis, cultivating my skills with help of professionals, fans and many other people.
					
					 My results in the games are thanks to the socialist country that has turned into a big harmonious family. 
					
					 Sue Kinsler, co-president of the Korean Cooperation Office for the Disabled and Orphans, said:
					
					 I was moved to see the officials of the C.C., Korean Federation for the Protection of the Disabled devotedly working for disabled persons. 
					
					 It is very admirable that the work with the disabled has made a progress even under the international sanctions and that compatriots overseas and in the homeland are pooling their efforts in the work.
					
					 I am happy to witness the great event for the disabled as well as the homeland growing richer and stronger with each passing day. I will work harder for the disabled in the homeland.

articles.title: Minju Joson Lays Bare Ulterior Aims Sought by U.S. in Reinforcing Its Overseas Military Bases
articles.content:
Minju Joson Lays Bare Ulterior Aims Sought by U.S. in Reinforcing Its Overseas Military Bases
 Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- According to foreign press reports, the U.S. is carrying out a new strategy for reinforcing its military presence overseas both in quality and quantity.
					 Minju Joson Saturday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The above-said actions of the U.S. are nothing but its military strategic moves to realize its scenario for world domination to all intents and purposes.
					
					 They made it clearer that it is the scenario of the U.S. to retain its military control over different parts of the world and carry out its strategy for world domination on its basis, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. is busy expanding the sphere of its control over the regions in which it is vitally interested by setting up its military bases in the world's vantage points of geopolitical importance and areas rich in strategic resources.
					
					 What merits a serious attention is that the U.S. is paying particular attention to reinforcing its military bases in south Korea and in its vicinity.
					
					 The U.S. is mulling setting up or reinforcing more than 100 military bases in 50 areas of south Korea in collusion with the south Korean puppet regime and spending over 11 billion U.S. dollars for this purpose.
					
					 This goes to prove that the U.S. seeks to realize the permanent presence of its forces in south Korea, establish a military control over the Korean Peninsula and unleash the second Korean War against the DPRK at any cost.
					
					 Those who had subjugated other countries by force of arms and made them act at their beck and call met a severe punishment by history without exception.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Lauds Undying Exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Lauds Undying Exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il were the lodestars of national reunification and outstanding leaders of the world revolution, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article. 
					 It goes on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung clarified the three principles of national reunification through the July 4 joint statement and set forth the ten-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo, providing fundamental guidelines for the reunification of the country.
					
					 Kim Jong Il authored famous works, formulating the idea and line for national reunification put forward by the President as the three charters for national reunification and advancing the five-point policy for great national unity as a powerful weapon for achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the country. He provided the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration, a landmark for national reunification. This was a noteworthy event which paved a wide avenue for independent reunification. 
					
					 The history of their leadership over socialist construction was a history in which they held aloft the banner of independence. This history records a period in which they steadfastly upheld the line of independence in politics, self-support in economy and self-reliance in national defence, decisively frustrating the pressure of big-power chauvinists, and the course in which they settled all problems in a unique way as required by the actual conditions of the country under the slogan "Let Us Live Our Own Way!" and experience gained in the struggle to build an invincible power with strong Juche character and national identity. 
					
					 In the 1990s Kim Jong Il made public such immortal works as "Abuses of Socialism Are Intolerable" and "Socialism Is a Science," clarifying  truth that socialism is sure to be revived and win final victory for its scientific accuracy and truth although it is undergoing painful twists and turns temporarily. 
					
					 Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il fully disclosed the reactionary nature of the imperialists' "peace strategy" and wisely led the struggle for boosting solidarity with the world independent forces against imperialism including the non-aligned movement. Thanks to their leadership a turning phase could take place in the struggle for building peaceful new society. 
					
					 When socialism was suffering ups and downs due to the moves of the imperialists and renegades of socialism Kim Jong Il made sure that the revolutionary parties strengthened international unity and solidarity under the banner of the Pyongyang Declaration. This was a great contribution to victoriously advancing the cause of socialism. 
					
					 The cause of national reunification and the global cause of independence started and led by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il are now being dynamically pushed forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Regime's Involvement in U.S. Secret Eavesdropping
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Regime's Involvement in U.S. Secret Eavesdropping
 Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- As disclosed, the south Korean puppet Intelligence Service offered the Pusan seabed communication network to foreign intelligence institutions including the U.S. National Security Agency and the Central Intelligence Agency in support of their secret eavesdropping of phone conversations of heads of state of various countries and internet messages.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The Intelligence Service's involvement in the U.S. secret eavesdropping as its servant is an inevitable role it has to play as a colonial stooge.
					
					 The puppet authorities' involvement in the secret eavesdropping of other countries to please their master, unaware of infringement upon their vital interests, is something which can be done by fools only.
					
					 In the wake of the disclosure of Seoul's involvement in the secret eavesdropping the relevant countries are calling the south Korean puppet ambassadors to deepen investigation into the case and they are expressing serious concern over it.
					
					 This case brought into bolder relief the fact that it is the south Korean puppet group which is busy having confabs with its master to defame and hurt other countries as his stooge while talking about "confidence" with them. 
					
					 What the south Korean authorities have done is little short of pricking their own eyes.
					
					 They would be well advised to bear in mind that their kowtowing to the U.S. is as foolish an act as digging up their own grave.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses Japan of Its Moves to Enact Law on Protecting Special Secrets
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses Japan of Its Moves to Enact Law on Protecting Special Secrets
 Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- The Japanese government's desperate moves to institute a law on protecting special secrets are aimed at setting  up a fascist system dating back to the era of Japanese imperialism, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article.
					 The bill the present ultra-right Japanese government seeks to adopt is designed to enforce repressive military dictatorship and push forward its scenario for overseas expansion in real earnest, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 It is the intention of the Japanese ruling forces to reduce the working masses to slaves of militarism who blindly obey them without any resistance.
					
					 The Japanese imperialists did so during their past rule. While invading Korea and its neighboring countries and igniting the Pacific War, they kept everything in top secrecy ranging from the drafting of their scenarios to methods of their implementation, etc. At that time broad strata of working masses in Japan just served as talking tools for carrying out their scenarios of aggression, knowing nothing about them.
					
					 The present ruling forces in Japan seek to concentrate all powers on the state administrative organs and further increase the authority of the repressive machinery.
					
					 In case the above-said bill passes through the Diet, it will abridge the right of ordinary public officials while dramatically increasing the power of judicial bodies. If this happens, even the opening of trifling information to public would make ordinary public officials liable to heavy punishment as criminals according to judgment and assertions of law-enforcement officials.
					
					 This will, at the same time, lead to weakening the Diet's function of watching the state administrative organs but strengthening such repressive machinery as the "Self-Defense Forces" and police. Such phenomena as paralyzing the function of the Diet and rendering it defunct could be found in the erstwhile fascist countries.
					
					 The attempt to adopt the bill is nothing but a farce staged by the militarist forces to have a tight grip on power and create an internal environment for rushing headlong into overseas expansion.
					
					 The reemergence of the fascist system in Japan would put peace and security in Northeast Asia and other parts of the Asia-Pacific region at peril.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Accused of Yielding to U.S. Pressure
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Accused of Yielding to U.S. Pressure
 Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) - At least 40 organizations of south Korea including the People's Solidarity for Revising Unequal SOFA held a press conference in Seoul on Dec. 4 denouncing the puppet authorities for yielding to the U.S. pressure on south Korea to  increase its share of upkeep of the U.S. forces.
					 At the press conference speakers said that the U.S. illegally accumulated more than a trillion won out of the upkeep of its forces collected from south Korea but is pressurizing it to increase next year's upkeep to over a trillion won.
					
					 The south Korean regime is, however, contemplating increasing the upkeep of the U.S. forces, they said, adding it is a serious problem that the regime is not rejecting the demand for increasing the upkeep, far from taking back the fund illegally accumulated by the U.S. forces.
					
					 If the authorities yield to the unreasonable demand of the U.S., they will encounter strong resistance of the people, the speakers warned.

articles.title: Action Staged in S. Korea in Defence of Government Employees' Union
articles.content:
Action Staged in S. Korea in Defence of Government Employees' Union
 Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- A press conference took place in Seoul on December 4 to inaugurate the south Korean Joint Measure Committee of Civic and Public Organizations against Suppression of Government Employees Union under the Pretext of Security and for Reform of Public Servants' Community made up of at least 150 civic and public organizations including the Solidarity for Progress and the Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society.
					 The committee said that the suppression of the Government Employees' Union by the Park Geun Hye group is nothing but a gimmick to tide over with ease their crisis sparked off by the organized interference in the election by power organs and a tyrannical action to stamp out the labor movement.
					
					 The organization declared that in the future it would disclose the Park regime's unreasonable suppression under the pretext of security, a follow-up of its illegal election, and launch actions for reforming the public servants' community and defending democracy and the Government Employees Union.
					
					 Speakers at the press conference recalled that many workers have been dismissed over the last more than decade since the Government Employees Union was formed, adding that they have struggled to combat injustice and corruption and build a proper public servants' community.
					
					 The above-said suppression of the union clearly indicates that the regime is keen to tide over its crisis.
					
					 They declared that religionists would come out in the actions demanding the resignation of Park and foil the crackdown on the union.
					
					 They also stressed that the peasants, too, would turn out in actions for the regime change.

articles.title: British Organizations Slam S. Korean Authorities' Provocation against DPRK
articles.content:
British Organizations Slam S. Korean Authorities' Provocation against DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on November 23 on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of the victory in the Yonphyong Island shelling battle.
					 The Korean People's Army (KPA), Juche-based revolutionary armed forces, dealt merciless counter-blows at the enemy on the island, getting it engulfed in flames, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The fear-stricken south Korean puppet forces and their American master ran helter-skelter.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces held even a "commemoration event", painting their heavy defeat as "victory," far from drawing a lesson from the shelling battle.
					
					 It was foolish, indeed, to describe a complete military setback as a "victory."
					
					 At that time the south Korean puppet forces implored the KPA to stop shelling.
					
					 They are still persisting in their reckless provocations against the DPRK. This indicates that they have not yet drawn a lesson from their defeat.
					
					 We are confident that the army and people of the DPRK will firmly defend the homeland of Juche, reunify the country and surely build a people's land of bliss under the wise guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the KPA, it stressed.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise Commemorated in Various Countries
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise Commemorated in Various Countries
 Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- Events were held in Bangladesh, Malaysia and Guinea on November 30 on the occasion of the second anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They included a remembrance meeting, lecture, photo and fine art exhibition and film show.
					
					 On display in the venues of the events were photos documenting the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were pictures and fine art pieces showing the real picture of the DPRK.
					
					 The chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy and other speakers said that Kim Jong Il developed in depth the Juche idea and Songun idea and wisely led the Korean people in their drive for building a thriving socialist nation and reunifying the country.
					
					 The DPRK turned into a nuclear weapons state and a turning phase was brought about in the building of a thriving nation thanks to Songun politics pursued by him, they noted, adding that his life totally dedicated to the country and its people and global independence would always be remembered not only by the Korean people but by progressive humankind.
					
					 The manager of the Dombo Enterprise Company of Malaysia recalled that upon hearing the sad news that Kim Jong Il passed away two years ago, hundreds of millions of world people held mourning events with bitterest grief.
					
					 The vice-manager of a construction company of Guinea stressed that Kim Jong Il would always be alive along with the invincible Workers' Party of Korea steering the Korean people's general advance for building a thriving nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in France
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in France
 Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- A French committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was inaugurated in Paris on November 29.
					 Andre Aubry, president of the France-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il during the remembrance period from December 1 to 17.

articles.title: Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Organizations of Brazil, Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Organizations of Brazil, Nigeria
 Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Brazil and Nigeria posted special write-ups on their websites on November 25 and 26 on the occasion of the second anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The Brazilian Committee for Remembering Leader Kim Jong Il in its article titled "Legacy left by leader Kim Jong Il" said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il endowed with rare ideological and theoretical wisdom formulated the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea, as an integral system of idea, theory and method of Juche.
					
					 He developed in depth the idea of attaching importance to arms and military affairs founded by Kim Il Sung as required by the new era, formulating it as the Songun idea and providing an invincible treasured sword for accomplishing the cause of independence.
					
					 He developed the Workers' Party of Korea into an invincible guiding force, the DPRK into an indestructible socialist state and the Korean People's Army into a matchless army.
					
					 He turned the whole society into a big family and the whole country into a political and ideological power in which all people are single-mindedly united with his politics of love and trust.
					
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea in its article titled "Kim Jong Il and his exploits dedicated to the cause of socialism" said that it is the greatest exploit performed by him in carrying out the cause of socialism that he protected the destiny of socialism.
					
					 The article stressed that the immortal exploits performed by Chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK Kim Jong Il in carrying out the cause of socialism are now being successfully carried forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Inspection of Panmunjom Remembered by British Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Inspection of Panmunjom Remembered by British Organization
 Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy posted an article on its website on Nov. 24 to mark the 17th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's inspection of the Panmunjom mission of the Korean People's Army. The article is entitled "Historic event to be specially recorded in history of Korean reunification."
					 It said:
					
					 Panmunjom is the place fraught with greatest tension.
					
					 No one can predict when a conflict would occur there.
					
					 Kim Jong Il visited such dangerous place.
					
					 He was a brilliant commander who had the enemy under his thumb, remaining unperturbed even in face of the formidable enemy.
					
					 The inspection of Panmunjom by the peerlessly Songun brilliant commander possessed of the spirit and grit of Mt. Paektu, ardent love for the country and strong will for reunification was a great deed in national history as it instilled courage and conviction of reunification into the Koreans.
					
					 At Panmunjom he renewed his will to successfully carry out the last instructions given by President Kim Il Sung for national reunification.
					
					 Recalling that his inspection of Panmunjom evoked lively response among south Korean people, the article noted that their high praise of his undying exploits is leading to hardening the conviction that Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's last instructions for national reunification are sure to be carried out by Marshal Kim Jong Un without fail.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Austrian Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Austrian Organization on Its Website
 Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" was posted by the Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and the DPRK on its website on Monday.
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 101 (2012), deals with the idea that it is the principled requirement for victoriously advancing the cause of the Korean revolution to hold leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and indicates the tasks to be carried out to steadily develop the WPK into the glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il was posted on the website.

articles.title: Deportado ciudadano norteamericano con antecedente delictivo contra la RPDC
articles.content:
Deportado ciudadano norteamericano con antecedente delictivo contra la RPDC
Pyongyang, 7 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Como ya trascendidos, un organo competente de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea retuvo al ciudadano norteamericano Merrill Edward Newman quien entro en el pais disfrazado de turista para averiguar si estan vivos o muertos los espias y terroristas, formados y enviados por el mismo en el periodo de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria (1950-1953) cuando era oficial de inteligencia.
					Segun el resultado de la investigacion correspondiente, Newman cometio actos hostiles a la RPDC con su erronea concepcion de ella.
					
					Tomando en consideracion su edad y estado de salud y el hecho de que el reconocio, pidio disculpas y se arrepintio sinceramente de sus actos diciendo que los cometio equivocado, el organo competente de la RPDC lo expulso desde el punto de vista humanitario.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje de condolencias a su homologo sudafricano
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje de condolencias a su homologo sudafricano
Pyongyang, 7 de diciembre (ACNC) -- En relacion con que Nelson Mandela, hijo del pueblo sudafricano, fallecio por larga enfermedad, el presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 6 un mensaje de condolencias al presidente de la Republica Sudafricana, Jacob Gedleyihlekisa Zuma.
					El remitente expresa profundas condolencias al destinatario y por su conducto, al gobierno y al pueblo de Sudafrica y a la familia del difunto.
					
					Senala que las hazanas logradas por Su Excelencia Nelson Mandela en la lucha por la causa anti-racismo y la democracia en Sudafrica quedaran eternas en la memoria del pueblo  sudafricano y la humanidad progresista.
					
					Desea que bajo la direccion del presidente, el gobierno y el pueblo de Sudafrica logren exitos en la lucha por la construccion de una nueva sociedad prospera de acuerdo con el deseo del difunto.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun critica adhesion surcoreana a la interceptacion ilegal de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun critica adhesion surcoreana a la interceptacion ilegal de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 7 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Se conocio que el Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia del Sur de Corea ayudo la interceptacion secreta de las llamadas telefonicas y las comunicaciones via Internet entre los jefes de Estado de varios paises por parte de la Agencia de Seguridad Nacional y la Agencia Central de Inteligencia de EE.UU. y otros organos extranjeros de inteligencia al ofrecerles la red submarina de comunicaciones de Pusan. 
					En este caso, el Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia no pudo actuar de otra manera porque sus agentes son lacayos coloniales de EE.UU., critica el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual de este sabado y continua:
					
					Es una tonteria que las autoridades surcoreanas se hayan incorporado a la interceptacion secreta a otros paises obedeciendo a ciegas a su amo gringo. 
					
					Al destaparse el presente caso, los paises victimas llamaron a los embajadores surcoreanos en los respectivos paises para pedirles las explicaciones al respecto y expresar seria preocupacion. 
					
					Se ha revelado esta vez que los titeres surcoreanos hablan por una parte de la "confianza" con otros paises y por la otra, se confabulan para danarlos actuando como lacayos de su amo estadounidense. 
					
					Ellos deben tener presente que el servilismo a EE.UU. es un acto suicida.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun rechaza intento de aprobar proyecto de nueva ley de Japon
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun rechaza intento de aprobar proyecto de nueva ley de Japon
Pyongyang, 7 de diciembre (ACNC) -- En un articulo individual de este sabado, el diario Rodong Sinmun revela que el actual gobierno japones de corte ultraderechista pretende aprobar a toda costa el proyecto de ley de proteccion de secretos especificos con el fin de establecer el regimen fascista como en el tiempo de imperialismo. 
					El proyecto en cuestion tiene por su meta aplicar la dictadura militar, realizar en etapa crucial la ambicion expansionista a ultramar y convertir las masas trabajadoras en esclavas del militarismo, adelanta el comentarista y prosigue:
					
					Sucedio lo mismo en el periodo de imperialismo japones.
					
					Antes de agredir a Corea y otros paises vecinos y provocar la Guerra del Pacifico, el imperialismo japones guardo en supersecreto el plan de guerra y el procedimiento de su cumplimiento. 
					
					Por eso, las amplias masas trabajadores de aquel entonces se utilizaron como medios vivos de guerra para realizar la ambicion agresiva de los imperialistas. 
					
					Los gobernantes actuales del pais isla tratan de concentrar el poder en los organos estatales de administracion y elevar la autoridad de los aparatos de represion. 
					
					Si se aprueba en la Dieta el proyecto, se reduciran los derechos de los funcionarios publicos y se aumentara la autoridad de los aparatos judiciales.
					
					En virtud de esa ley, los funcionarios publicos pueden recibir el castigo penal aunque publiquen algunos datos insignificantes. 
					
					Ademas, se debilitara la funcion de monitoreo de la Dieta sobre los organos estatales de administracion y se fortaleceran los aparatos de violencia como las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" y la policia. 
					
					Pues, el intento de Japon de aprobar el proyecto es una farsa de las fuerzas militaristas para tomar el poder en sus manos y preparar el ambiente interno favorable al expansionismo. 
					
					El establecimiento del regimen fascista en Japon pondra en peligro la paz y la seguridad del Nordeste Asiatico y Asia-Pacifico.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de lider de partido mexicano
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de lider de partido mexicano
Pyongyang, 7 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, recibio un mensaje que le enviara el 27 de noviembre el dirigente nacional del Partido del Trabajo de Mexico, Alberto Anaya Gutierrez. 
					El remitente rinde, en nombre de todos los militantes de su partido y de si mismo,  el  maximo tributo al Dirigente Kim Jong Il, eterno Secretario General del PTC con motivo del 2o aniversario de su fallecimiento. 
					
					Expresa conviccion de que bajo la destacada y probada guia del Mariscal, brillaran eternamente la idea y las hazanas revolucionarias del Songun del Dirigente y manifiesta su entero apoyo y firme solidaridad con la lucha del PTC y el pueblo coreano por construir un Estado prospero socialista y lograr la reunificacion independiente y pacifica del pais. 
					
					Desea de todo corazon grandes exitos en el noble trabajo del Mariscal quien conduce la causa revolucionaria del Songun y la de la independencia en el mundo entero.

articles.title: Premier coreano reconoce labores de Academias Estatales de Ciencias
articles.content:
Premier coreano reconoce labores de Academias Estatales de Ciencias
Pyongyang, 7 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El primer ministro de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, averiguo en el terreno el laboreo de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias que acogio 61o aniversario de su fundacion.
					Recorriendo la exposicion de ciencias, se entero en detalles de las especificaciones tecnicas y la eficiencia economica de varios equipos ultramodernos y del estado de su aplicacion y estimulo a los cientificos y tecnicos que libran la competencia tecnica y de cerebro para desarrollar nuevas tecnologias y nuevos productos.
					
					Acto seguido, averiguo los problemas surgidos en la construccion de la zona cientifica de Unjong y convoco la reunion de consulta de los funcionarios interesados.
					
					En la ocasion, Pak dijo que bajo la sabia direccion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, la academia se desarrollo como fidedigna base de investigacion cientifica del pais y destaco la necesidad de glorificar las proezas imborrables de los Generalisimos y apoyar el proposito del Mariscal Kim Jong Un de construir una potencia prospera, con los exitos cientificos y tecnicos.
					
					En la reunion consultiva se discutieron las medidas para acondicionar mejor la mencionada zona como la base autoctona de investigacion cientifica y centro de desarrollo y divulgacion de IT, la nano-tecnologia, la ingenieria energetica y otras ciencias y tecnicas sofisticadas.
